performances.venue: Deer Creek Music Center Noblesville, IN
performances.description: Close Encouters down the road from Muncie Indiana, where the UFOs are first seen
I know its only 25 seconds as it goes into the greatest Bertha of all time, but each member plays the riff at some point.

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: In the middle of a drums/space then into a great spanish jam. some fine dead moments here
Right at the end of space
Friday the 13th, super brief, but it's there between Dancin' and Wharf Rat, both great versions!
